dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 1428 IH: Free to Grow Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Trone (for himself, Mr. Joyce of Ohio, Ms. Mace, Ms. Pingree, Mr. Blumenauer, Ms. Titus, and Ms. Bonamici) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Agricultural Marketing Act of 1946 to repeal the prohibition for certain individuals convicted of a felony offense to participate in hemp production, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Free to Grow Act of 2023.

section.header: Repeal of felony with respect to hemp production
section.text: Section 297B(e)(3)(B) of the Agricultural Marketing Act of 1946 (7 U.S.C. 1639p(e)(3)(B)) is repealed.
